name: 德語（二）
description: This course is the continuation of the course - German I. This semester, the conversation topics will focus on foods, dietary habits, eating in restaurants, talking about time, daily activities, and making appointments or inviting friends. In terms of grammar, students will learn auxiliary verbs, rules of declension, adjectives, prepositions, and possessive pronouns. Intensive learning is strongly recommended.
goals: 讓學生認識德語和中文、英文間的差異
訓練學生在德語聽、說、讀、寫的能力
教授中、德文化間的差異、培養學生赴德實習前應有的語言文化涵養以及教學服務的態度
以任務為導向的群組報告作業，培養學生團隊合作學習的能力
